explains: n. （Rice）人名；（瑞典）里瑟；（塞）里采；（英）赖斯

hybrid rice 杂交稻；杂种稻
condoleezza rice 康多莉扎·赖斯（上届美国国务卿）

sentences.en: Rice aspired to go to college.
We eat rice every single day.
Could you give the rice a stir?
